  • Method Details

    • faces

      public PixelateFacesTask.Builder faces(int... faces)
      Sets which faces to pixelate. Face numbers correspond to the order in which they appear in an image.
      Parameters:
      faces - one or more integers (faces) to blur

    • faces

      public PixelateFacesTask.Builder faces(String faces)
